Comments_List: Leadership takes many shapes and forms.

Naval Science lab was truly fantastic this semester. It seems that the Midshipman staff made the most of the tools and constraints that were given to them and worked hard to put on thoughtful labs that were organized around different themes.
It is boring by nature, but required

Strengths of ROTC Lab time include the leadership reaction course and the focused break out sessions devoted to discussing and examining leadership.
The biggest weakness observed was failure to adhere to time blocks allotted for lab.
If you're not in Naval ROTC, I have no idea why you would attend this "class." If you are in Naval ROTC, you do not have a choice.
While ROTC lab is mandatory to be in the program, there were enjoyable aspects of lab.
